definition: fleabane (family Asteraceae)/disheveled/classifier for luxuriant plants, smoke, ashes, campfires: clump, puff

sentences.english: The shower head drizzled water on my head.
sentences.chinese: 蓮蓬頭把水像下毛毛雨似的灑在我頭上。

sentences.english: Lin is also required to be inside lotus ah.
sentences.chinese: 還有蓮鬚就是蓮蓬裏面的須啊。

sentences.english: The upper cupule or fleshy capsule of the lotus dries out at maturity and separates from the plant.
sentences.chinese: 上面多肉的杯狀蓮蓬在成熟後變幹，然後從母體脫離。

sentences.english: Install a filter in your showerhead, too, to be really green.
sentences.chinese: 在你的蓮蓬頭上裝一臺淨化器也是綠色的選擇。

sentences.english: Furthermore, waterlily blooms float on water surface and bear no woody pod but round berries.
sentences.chinese: 睡蓮花貼近或浮於水面，不具蓮蓬而結漿果。

sentences.english: Hang the shower hose back when finish showering.
sentences.chinese: 沐浴完畢蓮蓬頭應掛回原處。

sentences.english: Yeah, sure. My showerhead is very impressed with me.
sentences.chinese: 對，我的蓮蓬頭就是我的麥克風。
裝個超低水流的蓮蓬頭吧。

sentences.english: He turned on the shower and I dropped the towel, then placed my arms around his waist.
sentences.chinese: 他打開蓮蓬頭，我丟掉毛巾，他讓我環住他的腰。

sentences.english: I want to eat Unfortunately, only one teacher lotus home.
sentences.chinese: 我越喫越想喫，可惜，老師家裏只有一隻蓮蓬。

definition: to lie in disarray/to cut across/to traverse
tender and beautiful/also written 嬌艷|娇艳
luan and phoenix/husband and wife/virtuous person/sovereign/belle
venation (pattern of veins on a leaf)
rouge and powder/(fig.) the fair sex
national grace, divine fragrance (idiom); an outstanding beauty
Jiguan district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang
